info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:10PM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches possible, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In New York, Western Schenectady, Eastern Rensselaer, Eastern Columbia and Western Ulster Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick conditions on untreated road surfaces and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas may see snow mixed with rain, reducing snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
